With practice, setting boundaries gets easier. 

There are two ways to think about getting things done. Nonessentialists push through tasks, making it a struggle. Essentialists, on the other hand, use the time they save by cutting out the unnecessary to create a system that makes execution smooth and almost effortless. 

Earlier, we compared life to a cluttered closet. An Essentialist knows that to keep that closet organized, you need a routine. Regular maintenance is key. ðŸ§¹
